lines.text: [quote from English version]

[singing]
You left today, without a goodbye, big girls never cry.

[singing]
Big girls never cry.

[singing]
Out of the blue, wait and tell me where and why, big girls never cry.

[singing]
Big girls never cry.
[English version]
[after electrocuting two men and two dogs]
Even the most gentle dog has his limits.
[English version]
I swear by Aunt Wanda, we'll pay them back.
[English version]
Fear may be contagious, but so is courage, my friends.
[English version]
Oh dear me! You look like you're really in trouble.
All my life I've been hauling flowersacks - thousands! Day in and day out - and now this? I don't even want to think about it.
Maybe I can help? Pull yourself together, all right?
You're the one to talk - what do you know? You can just buzz off when things get rough.
[English version]
[the machine makes animals out of sausages]
It's the only way out.
Through the machine?
[to Tortellini]
You be our scout - you go first.
Why me?
Didn't I hear you say you're our leader?
[Quote from English version]

[singing]
You left today, without a goodbye, big girls never cry.

[singing]
Big girls never cry.

[singing]
Out of the blue, without telling me where and why, big girls never cry.

[singing]
Big girls never cry.
